summary: Provides the core integration layer for Google Vertex AI and Google AI Studio language models within LiteLLM, including a base class for authentication and request handling, utilities for building and validating API calls, and a concrete implementation for non‑Gemini Vertex AI models supporting synchronous, asynchronous, and streaming completions.
business_intent: Allow applications using LiteLLM to seamlessly access and invoke Vertex AI and Google AI Studio LLMs, handling auth, region configuration, request formatting, error management, and response streaming to expand AI capabilities across Google’s model offerings.
